channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22164] Vectorized Limit operator returns wrong number of results with offset
item.description: Vectorized Limit operator returns wrong number of results with offset
item.summary: Vectorized Limit operator returns wrong number of results with offset

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12979580 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Hi vgarg,

Can you please help me review the pull request https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/762/files?

The issue here is an off-by-one error in the vector limit operator when there is an offset value.

hi Vineet:

Can you do a review of the above pull request?
